title: Who truly makes the better music, the UK or the USA? - Quora

response.answer_text: Today I was driving a hire car back to Amsterdam airport. I had the music on pretty loud. Motörhead with Wendy O Williams singing Stand by your man. So that's a country song being sung by a duet of a punk rocker and a heavy metal god. One from the US the other UK. Great music doesn't need a location, just a soul. I'm a “Brit” and like music from everwhere but seriously do not get the Rolling Stones.
